page.title: 07WILDWOODS WATER GARDENS
page.content: At Wildwoods Water Garden Centre fish, plants, fountains, ornaments and accessories are sold.Wildwoods covers 2.5 acres, employs 12 staff and opens to the general public daily from 8.30 -5.30.Weekends are the busiest time, Spring the busiest season.The staff grow plants, buy and sell fish, and clean. Also expert help can be given to customers wanting to keep fish in ponds or aquariums. Both indoor and outdoor plants are grown at Wildwoods.Water plants are grown in flowing river water, other plants need special compost.There is one heated glasshouse, and watering is by electronically controlled spray lines.In the winter mercury lamps are used.Altogether there are 20,000 fish at Wildwoods.Their smallest fish is a botoa, and the largest is a 10-15lb. carp.The waterfall is 10-12ft. high.
